DOC.brief_title: Small Steps Big Changes : A Lifestyle Program Reduce Risk Developing Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: The study one-group repeated measure design primary outcome exercise adherence 12 month post 3-week supervised exercise program . There randomization individual condition . Exercise adherence measure use self-report physical activity ( use Godin leisure time exercise questionnaire ) subsample also wear tri-axial accelerometer measure total time spend moderate-to-vigorous physical activity assess 7 day . Secondary outcome include physical fitness , haemoglobin A1C , quality life , self-regulatory efficacy , anthropometrics , diet exercise-related cognitive error . The 3-week lifestyle program include six session lifestyle coach exercise session perform home . These session focus regular healthy lifestyle include walking ( exercise kind ) least three time per week highlight simple dietary strategy link reduced risk T2D . The 3-week supervised exercise program include brief exercise counseling session teach participant self-regulatory skill promote independence long-term adherence exercise healthy diet . At conclusion three-week program , participant ask continue exercise minimum three time per week twelve month .
